CreditMemoLineTax.name: CreditMemoLineTax
CreditMemoLineTax.description: Represents tax information of a credit memo line of type Tax.

BillingAddressId.description: The billing address of the parent credit memo line.

CalculationStatus.description: The status of the tax calculation.

CorpCrcyCnvTaxAmount.description: The total tax amount of the credit memo line tax in corporate currency. Available in API version 63.0 and later.

CorporateCurrencyCvsnDate.description: The date on which the credit memo line tax amounts are converted to the corporate currency. Available in API version 63.0 and later.

CorporateCurrencyCvsnRate.description: The exchange rate that's used to convert the credit memo line tax amounts to the corporate currency. Available in API version 63.0 and later.

CorporateCurrencyIsoCode.description: The currency ISO code of the corporate currency. Available in API version 63.0 and later.

CreditMemoLineId.description: Required. The ID of the parent charge or adjustment credit memo line record that a credit memo line tax is related to.

CreditMemoLineTaxNumber.description: Required. An auto-generated number identifying a credit memo line tax.

Description.description: Additional details about the credit memo line tax.

EndDate.description: The end date of a credit memo line tax.

LegalEntityAccountingPeriodId.description: The ID of the legal entity accounting period record that's related to a credit memo line tax.

LegalEntityId.description: The ID of the legal entity record that's related to a credit memo line tax.

Product2Id.description: The product or service being credited in the parent credit memo line. Available in API version 62.0 only.

ReferenceEntityItemId.description: The invoice line tax corresponding to a credit memo line tax.

ShipFromAddressId.description: The ship from address specified in the parent credit memo line. Available in API version 64.0 and later.

ShippingAddressId.description: The shipping address of the parent credit memo line.

StartDate.description: The start date of a credit memo line tax.

TaxAmount.description: The total amount of a credit memo line tax.

TaxCode.description: The code that's used to calculate the tax rate for the parent credit memo line.

TaxDocumentNumber.description: The document number that's used to calculate the tax rate for the parent credit memo line.

TaxEffectiveDate.description: The date used to calculate the tax amount.

TaxName.description: The user-defined name for a credit memo line tax.

TaxRate.description: The percentage that's used to calculate tax.

TaxTransactionNumber.description: The number of the transaction in the external tax engine that calculated tax for the parent credit memo line.

TaxTreatmentId.description: The ID of the tax treatment record that's related to a credit memo line tax.

CreditMemoLineTax.accessRules: the Tax Admin permission set to access this object
